entry.content:
In a dream, I saw a man standing before me in a house, dimly lit, so I could see no details, but it could have been in a kitchen. He looked at me with a friendly face and I knew it was Jesus. I asked him, "Do you remember me when I lived on another planet?" He did not answer, but smiled, and then gave me a hug.

Even though he did not give me an answer, I think the entire dream implies that I did live on another planet. But because we are here to take a test, he does not give us our memories from our previous life, or else we would be compelled to believe in God and then we would no longer have free will to choose either him or his adversary to be our God.

Why would we leave our previous place to come to Earth and agree to have our memories erased? Answer: to become children of God.... if we pass the test.

submitted by /u/In-the-clouds
[link] [comments]
entry.title: Did you live on another planet before you were born here.... with your memories wiped?

entry.title: Dream Group Leader's Guide

entry.content:
Hey s/dreams

In my dream I was at a vacant construction site. The building was far from being complete, and no one was working on it at the moment. After the first time I said meat and protein were crucial to a healthy diet, I got surrounded by beetles and spiders.

I ran off and hid in a big concrete pipe segment. But then I said it again and the beetles and spiders soon found me. These were very big beetles and spiders; the spiders were black widows as big as beetles. At least they didn't crawl onto me; however, I didn't want to be around them.

I had a heat ray gun shaped like a magnifying glass or a magnifying glass that just functioned like a heat ray and didn't need the sun. I started burning the heads of beetles and spiders. I hoped it would catch every other bug on fire, but it didn't.

So I ran out of the construction site, but didn't find a city. Instead of I found a barren wasteland and a arcane teleportation circle on the ground. According to it, I was at the border of Hell and Earth (closer to Hell than Earth). Before the spiders and beetles could come after me, I teleported away.

The teleporter landed me in the stateless city of people who escaped the governments of the world. But just outside the gates of the city was a dangerous jungle filled with pirates and bandits.

Also as night approached, Jupiter, Mars, and the Moon were aligning. I then turned into a panther. The first thing I encountered was a poacher who thought I was an ordinary panther until my Celtic fire spell burned his net.

I went on a murderous rampage. I woke up when I noticed every pirate, bandit, poacher, and so on coincidentally had silk handkerchiefs.

submitted by /u/antares
[link] [comments]
entry.title: I had a dream where every time I said meat and protein are crucial to a healthy diet I would get surrounded by beetles and spiders.

entry.content:
Hey s/dreams

In my dream, my friends and I were stranded at it and were waiting to be rescued by the military.

Before the evac team arrived, we came across two ghosts. One was an old guy in a top hat and the other has lost its humanity, no longer having a human form. The two ghosts wanted to be evacuated too, but they can't leave the nuclear power plant grounds and must bind themselves to one of our possessions.

I only had a smartphone on me, so it was their limited option. However, I had premonitions. If I didn't let them bind to my smartphone, they as ghosts are unaffected by the impending meltdown. If I let them bind to my smartphone, my smartphone will be haunted. One of the haunts will be the device displaying a retro video game and not working; however, the ghost that lost its humanity will gain a new form as a kitsunemimi miko. She in the retro world will be visited by the ghost in the top hat in the pixel sakura tree forest.

I didn't want a supernatural computer virus on my smartphone that would spread upon file transfer, so I declined letting them bind to a possession. But when the military came and we got in the jeep, the ghosts who paid taxes within the past 50 years started haunting the vehicle. One of the mounted turrets near-fatally shot a soldier. Then, the driver wasn't able to control the vehicle, and it kept zigzagging on and off the road.

Somewhere around the point of thinking the soldier that got shot wasn't going to make to base in time to be treated, I woke up.

submitted by /u/antares
[link] [comments]
entry.title: I had a dream where I was at an old, abandoned nuclear power plant that didn't entirely shutdown.

entry.title: After meditating using abstract illusions https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q0H_6h_ic0w do I have very strange dreams ? Why?

entry.content:
Thumbnail image from https://LivingTheOrwellianDream.wordpress.com/. I don't know if it's a good blog or not but I like the title and image.

I can't say why, but today waking up I had four very strong impressions in rapid succession. It's rare that I even get one worthy of writing down. They all happen to be neat concepts, though with no segue or transition between that I recall, much less a logical narrative.

I don't put a lot of stock in dreams, but sometimes they can give you great ideas. Caffeine can make it painfully difficult to sleep but the short dreams can be vivid or lucid or both. Sometimes oversleeping or catching up can give you dynamic dreams. After a week or two of erratic sleep of naps from 30 min to 5 hours as often as necessary, I finally had a long sleep of 10 hours interrupted only by pee breaks.

Grass & Collar

Across from the house where I grew up in my youth I'm on a sidewalk. I can't stray far because I have a mechanical phone collar. I'm trapped by a social credit score system and a punishment system embedded in my phone collar. (Ironically, in real life, I haven't had a phone for almost a decade.) I can see wild grass in a nearby field but I can't get to it because of the collar. Fortunately there's less than a clump, just a few strands of tall healthy seeding grass by the sidewalk and a tree that was missed by the lawnmower that I'm assuming was operated by a droid. In my dreary apartment, in a bowl, I'd already collected some healthy soil a handful at a time, and can now plant the beginnings of my micro field. I just hope it's not GMO.

Double Date

Two couples are in a vintage convertible, like a double date at a drive in in the 50s or 60s, (and this scene unfolds from one vantage as I or the camera is standing on the hood looking down over the windscreen at all 4). All 4 have mind reading head sets on, that are also mind projection sets. (Don't ask me how I know this.) The boy in the front right seat and the girl in the back right seat are sharing their experience. The girl in the front left seat and the boy in the back left seat are sharing their experience. Then the back couple and the front couple lean in for a kiss, while simultaneously experiencing what's in the seat in front or behind them. Not holding back, the back seat couple connect a moment earlier, diving in with tongues. The guy in the front right recoils and rips off his head set and leaps out of the car. I don't know why but I have some guesses. Maybe he doesn't like kissing boys. Maybe he doesn't like whisker burn. Maybe kissing is only for romance. Maybe it was just too much sensation. I just witnessed it. I can't explain it.

Blind Date

In a bar, on two tall stools at a small table, a couple is on a blind date of sorts. It seems to be like a contest, small modest game show, reality show, or prank show. The couple is nearing the end of the show. They've been getting on well - however, each of them has a virtual reality head set covering their eyes and ears. But they've been getting on really well and want to meet the real person. Assistants help them unstrap and remove their VR head gear and the couple is free to turn to see each other. The prank is revealed that they are already a couple, perhaps living together common law, maybe even married. The guy has a little fit and storms off. Again, I don't know why and can only speculate. Was he tired of her and wanting someone else? Was he caught "cheating"? Was she? I just witnessed it. I can't explain it.

Trutherism, The Game

This last one was less clear, in part interrupted by my excitement and making it more lucid, in part by waking up.

The setting was a high tech room that was in bad shape. Maybe it's an old submarine, a crippled space station, or some abandoned lab on Earth or underground - a closed game environment with limited options. An old man and young woman are trying to stop their room from being flooded or figure out a way to escape. Instantly I'm reminded of my /s/Trutherism101 characters. But in this different environment it's apparent they have to solve a problem to survive. Then it comes to me - what if this game scenario were applied with trutherism lessons, where you have to learn how corrupted the matrix of rigged systems are - and then apply the lesson somehow to escape to the next level.

Afterthought, maybe you're trapped, by an evil genius terrorist (like the Saw movies), but over time as you learn about history you realize he's not a terrorist after all, and you never die but you learn the truths of history - that the elites and their state, the corporatocracy, are always the true villainous terrorists.

Looking for a neat thumbnail I also came across these neat images:

https://static.infowars.com/2011/02/i/article-images/cometrue2.jpg

https://ih1.redbubble.net/image.11768524.5089/flat,800x800,075,f.jpg

https://i.pinimg.com/736x/53/9c/4b/539c4b8ccf56fc09d3f22e3f7fbace92--george-orwell-.jpg

https://img2.grunge.com/img/gallery/the-weirdest-ways-illnesses-influenced-history/tuberculosis-georges-orwellian-nightmare-1528475917.jpg

submitted by /u/JasonCarswell
[link] [comments]
